title: Amie Wilkinson
summary: Amie Wilkinson (born 1968) is an American mathematician and Professor of Mathematics at the University of Chicago.[1] Her research topics include smooth dynamical systems, ergodic theory, chaos theory and semisimple Lie groups.[1] Wilkinson, in collaboration with Christian Bonatti and Sylvain Crovisier,[2][3] partially resolved the twelfth problem on Stephen Smale's list of mathematical problems for the 21st Century.[4]
